name: Dancing with Myself - Like Nobody's Looking
name_original: Dancing with Myself - Like Nobody's Looking
description:
From the 2022 Global Game Jam.  You're just chillin'....dancing in the mirror. Fire Ballz!!! What is happening? And your perception keeps swapping from real world to "inside the mirror".

Ok so no scoring or any other interaction, but gimme a break...it was a GGJ submission so we never had a chance to finish it.  Add some comments and requests to do so and maybe we'll find a free weekend to spice it up.
